main event: An unidentified flying object was observed by several officers and airmen at Kadena Air Force Base on 7 October 1951, detected first on radar and later visually.
interesting points: The UFO was tracked on radar moving at speeds estimated between 600 to 900 knots., It exhibited unusual movements, including making abrupt 90-degree turns., The object was described as a bright white light, round in shape., Attempts to intercept the object were made but it evaded pursuit., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 to 15 minutes before the objects disappeared from view.
witness description: officers and airmen stationed at Kadena AFB
